message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to consider it, but I think the product is worth more than $10500. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11200.
I understand Alice, but I still believe the product is worth less than $11200 to me. I am willing to pay $10800 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10800. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $11100.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $10900 for the product.
I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10900, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $11050.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I am willing to pay $10950 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11100, but that's as low as I can go.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $11000 for the product.
